message.entry: Code coverage for PIL based execution is not yet supported

Code execution time profiling and code coverage are both enabled. To avoid this error, disable coverage from the Coverage Settings. Alternatively, on the Simulation > Configuration Parameters > Code Generation > Verification pane, clear the ''{0}'' and ''{1}'' check boxes.

The parameter ''{1}'' is enabled for model ''{0}''. However, this parameter is not supported when code coverage is enabled.\nTo run the SIL simulation, either disable coverage from the Coverage Settings or clear the ''{1}'' check box.
